page.title: 20AUTHORS COMMENTS
page.content: The following quotes were made by the {children of Holy Cross Junior School, {Shrewsbury when commenting on their {Domesday Study Area: A lovely landscape...A rolling landscape flows along picking out the old farm buildings worn by time. The farm houses are isolated old and shabby. They have far more character than the houses around Holy Cross. There is modern farming equipment and electric fences to keep the cattle in one place...narrow lanes and little traffic...didn't see any traffic lights...Houses and bungalows were detached and looked as if people who lived in them had a lot of money. Life in the rural area seemed to be slower than in an urban area, the people are rather quiet and shy. People in rural areas know each other better, they are very close knit and friendly.
